short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a touch of nature to your browser with these small, hungry fish.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch them as they follow your mouse hoping you will feed them by clicking the surface of the water.

Click the colors link to color the fish, the water and the food.
